Text: A nice item to post. Thank you.

When are you going to start seeding this?
I have been connected to the tracker for the past 15 minutes, and there is nothing there yet.

Always start seeding a new torrent BEFORE you post it.

It is seeding now, but very slowly.
Availability sits at 0.181
Time to complete is shown as 20 days.

Using such a large major block size (1 MB) when you create a .TORRENT file, is not such a good idea. It makes the replication within the swarm very inefficient. You'll get much better results if you use a smaller block size of 256 KB or 512 KB.
an How do I make a smaller block, I am new to this uploading. Thanks for your input.
velvetfog, I did some checking, and I had auto detect, so on my next upload I will change it. Again thanks for the help
